properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_RESERVATION JOIN TB_NONMEM ON (RE_MEM_NO = MEM_NO) WHERE MEM_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM( SELECT RESER_NO, MEM_ID, RESER_NAME, MEM_PHONE FROM TB_RESERVATION JOIN TB_NONMEM ON (MEM_NO = RE_MEM_NO) JOIN TB_MEMBER ON(TB_NONMEM.MEM_NO = TB_MEMBER.MEM_NO) WHERE MEM_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY RESER_NO DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT HOTEL_NAME, HOTEL_PATH, TO_CHAR(RESER_DATE,'YYYY.MM.DD')"RESER_DATE", TB_RESERVATION.CHECKIN_TIME, TB_RESERVATION.CHECKOUT_TIME, BICYCLE, PEOPLE, PAYMENT, PAYMENT_PRICE FROM TB_RESERVATION JOIN TB_ROOM ON (TB_RESERVATION.ROOM_NO = TB_ROOM.ROOM_NO) JOIN TB_HOTEL ON (TB_ROOM.HOTEL_NO = TB_HOTEL.HOTEL_NO) JOIN TB_NONMEM ON (RE_MEM_NO = MEM_NO) WHERE MEM_STATUS = 'Y' AND CANCEL_YN = 'N' GROUP BY HOTEL_NAME, HOTEL_PATH, RESER_DATE, TB_RESERVATION.CHECKIN_TIME, TB_RESERVATION.CHECKOUT_TIME, BICYCLE, PEOPLE, PAYMENT, PAYMENT_PRICE
